content: sweet pea valentine elephant is a charming amigurumi design created with scheepjes stonewashed xl when made using the recommended hook sweet pea measures approximately 5 5 inches tall **if you are using safety eyes or small embellishments please note they are not recommended for children under 3 years old for younger children embroider eyes and details or add a safety note for precaution ** please note that this pattern is for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell the item that you make from this pattern but i ask that you please refer back to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern online or in print thank you for your support
